name: Collector Service Recycled
description:
COLLECTOR SERVICE RECYCLED

Note: Please enter fullscreen on the web version(F11). Thank you!

Collector Service is a small game about collecting trash from the sea and helping the ocean! Earn money, find souvenirs and buy upgrades for your gondola.

The idea came from real life trash cleaning with a gondola. The game was made by 2 friends and some help from a musician in Gamemaker Studio. It was a summer 2020 project and took around 3 months.

Now, we refreshed and improved it for the SEAJAM game jam!

If you want to see the differences in versions, you can click here.

Go #TeamSeas!

We hope you'll have fun playing the new Collector Service Recycled! If you encounter any bugs or glitches, make sure to let us know!

CREDITS:

Programming: Ma31n

Art: StavexYt

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nubilumgamesofficial/
